Detailed Description

Type describing payload of ZCL Discovery Attributes Command.

Definition at line 1021 of file zcl.h.

Field Documentation

ZCL_AttributeId_t ZCL_DiscoverAttributesReq_t::startAttributeId

The start attribute identifier field is 16-bit in length and specifies the ID of the attribute from which to begin attribute discovery.

Definition at line 1025 of file zcl.h.

uint8_t ZCL_DiscoverAttributesReq_t::maxAttributeIds

The maximum attribute IDs field is 8-bit in length and specifies the maximum number of attribute IDs that should be returned in the resulting discovery attributes response command.

Definition at line 1029 of file zcl.h.
